title: Senior MLOps Engineer
summary: Highly experienced and results-driven Senior MLOps Engineer with 8+ years of expertise in designing, implementing, and maintaining scalable machine learning systems in production. Proficient in MLOps best practices, CI/CD pipelines, cloud infrastructure (AWS, Azure), containerization, and orchestration technologies. Passionate about streamlining ML workflows, improving model reliability, and driving data-driven innovation.

cloud: AWS (S3, EC2, EKS, SageMaker, Lambda, Glue, RDS)
Azure (AKS, Azure ML, Data Factory, Blob Storage)

description: Led the design and implementation of scalable MLOps platforms and CI/CD pipelines for machine learning models, reducing deployment time by 40%.
Orchestrated Kubernetes clusters on AWS EKS and Azure AKS for robust model serving and batch inference, ensuring high availability and fault tolerance.
Developed and maintained infrastructure-as-code (IaC) using Terraform for cloud resource provisioning across AWS and Azure environments.
Implemented MLflow for experiment tracking, model registry, and reproducible model lifecycle management.
Designed and built monitoring and alerting solutions using Prometheus and Grafana for production ML models, enhancing system stability and performance.
Built and automated data pipelines using Apache Airflow for machine learning feature engineering and model training.
Deployed containerized machine learning models using Docker and Kubernetes, improving scalability and portability.
Collaborated with data scientists to transition research prototypes into production-ready ML services.
Implemented continuous integration and continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices for ML codebases, reducing manual effort and errors.
Managed cloud resources on AWS, including S3, EC2, and Lambda for various ML workloads.
Developed ETL pipelines for data ingestion and transformation from various sources into a centralized data warehouse.
Assisted in the maintenance and optimization of SQL databases.
Wrote scripts in Python for data cleaning and pre-processing tasks.
Supported senior engineers in deploying and monitoring data services.
